config: We want to thank everyone who participated in our Pumpkin Carving Contest on October 23rd. We received a total of 15 spooktacular photo entries and had a great time admiring your imaginative carvings. Congratulations to Donovan Coronado and Andrea Cervantes, enthusiastic pumpkin carvers, who put their creativity and skills to work by shaping their orange squashes into astounding creations.
